title: Implement GitHub API client for reading .tasks and .epics
description: Create GitHub API client to read files from .tasks/ and .epics/ directories in the main branch. Parse JSON files to build task and epic lists. Handle API rate limits and error cases. Cache data in localStorage for offline access.

comments.text: Starting task implementation: fetch tasks and epics from GitHub via API
Added GitHub API epics fetcher, caching tasks and epics in localStorage, updated contexts and tests.
